DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , non-randomized , observational study conduct United States.Up sixty ( 60 ) subject enrol . The purpose study evaluate long-term utility usability Dexcom G4 Continuous Glucose Monitoring ( CGM ) System . Subjects follow monthly period one year .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Glycemic Control Using Adjunctive Continuous Glucose Monitoring With Dexcom G4 System
DOC.criteria: Require intensive insulin therapy , define use Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion ( CSII ) i.e . insulin pump multiple daily injection ( MDI . Willing refrain use acetaminophen contain ( ACT ) medication study , 24hours initial sensor insertion . Have extensive skin changes/ diseases preclude wear device . Dialysis .
